element.name: TTestLazEnvironmentOpts.SetUp
element.short: This method will SetUp then TestEnvironment
element.descr: It initializes FEnvironmentOptions and sets the FDataPath-variable to the right path.

element.name: TTestLazEnvironmentOpts.TearDown
element.descr: This method frees the FEnvironmentOptions - object.

element.name: TTestLazEnvironmentOpts.TestSetUp
element.descr: It tests that FEnvironmentOptions is correctly setup and the directory in FDataPath-vaiable exists.

element.name: TTestLazEnvironmentOpts.FEnvironmentOptions
element.descr: initialized in the SetUp-method an destroyed in the TearDown-method
